title: BRMC/Black Angels gig poster fonts
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130324051850im_/http:/typophile.com/files/brmc_la_wiltern_5600.jpg)

I'm talking about the two fonts used in the first two lines.  
They both look familiar but I don't know their names.

The second one may be modified/created for this purpose, dunno, since the part of the L leads that perfectly into the red A.

Any help appreciated.
author: a_song_away

comments.content:
Futura Black on the left

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/futura-black/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130324051850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/futura-black/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/futura-black/")

The second half i know exists, if only from my Letraset rub-down days... this is close:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/lazar/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130324051850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/lazar/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/discourse/lazar/")
Black, Rebel and Motorcycle Club is Braggadocio (not Futura Black)

Excellent, you guys are fast. Thanks a lot.

I found a link to the Braggadocio but can't seem to find a site to purchase the Baby Teeth from.

Edit: Nevermind, seems the digitalized version is called Bebit
Well what are you planning on using it for? if it's for the same campaign then sure use that font, but I'm sure you could just custom your own shapes in the style that they did for personal use.
BRMC is a great live band, BTW.
